translations: （指人）圆滑的（ slick 的最高级）

sentences.sentence: “These aren’t the slickest applications in the world,” Mr. Abelson said.
sentences.translation: Abelson说，“这些并非世界上最精巧的应用程序。

sentences.sentence: Even the slickest PR effort can fail miserably if Internet users choose to ignore it.
sentences.translation: 如果网络用户选择漠视，那么再好的公关也会碰一鼻子灰。

sentences.sentence: Roads are slickest when rain has just started and hasn't had time to wash away the oil.
sentences.translation: 当雨刚开始下还没有时间把油冲走的时候，道路是最光滑的。
